page.title: 10Parbold Clubs and Societies
page.content: { }The people we spoke to were high in their praise for the Community Centre which is used a great deal by many groups in Parbold. It is used by the Youth Club, the Women's Institute, the Parbold and Newburgh Garden Society, the Mother and Toddlers Group, and various sporting clubs such as Badminton, Judo, Gymnastics, and Bridge. Bingo is also played there. There are also educational classes being conducted at the Centre in Arts and Crafts and Local History. In fact, so many people are using this facility that there is a move to obtain planning permission to extend the centre to meet the needs of the area.
